snippet.title: Rape-accused Perrottet a 'complete mess'
snippet.content: The morning after Jean Claude Perrottet allegedly raped a woman at a university party he admitted he had been drunken "mess", a NSW jury has heard. Perrottet, 20, is on trial at the Downing Centre District Court after pleading not guilty to three counts of sexual intercourse without consent after a University of Sydney end-of-year formal in October 2015. "OK, so as I remember more of last night I'm really sorry for being a complete mess," Perrottet said in a message to a friend read out in court on Thursday. (C) AAP 2017
